entry.dcterms:description: the comprehensive analysis of the Hungarian stock of flats, the social, demographic, income situations of the residents of the flats, as a result of which the social-statistical analysis of housing situation can be done from many aspects
entry.dcterms:subject: censuses
economic policy
family life, marriage, relationship
housing
consumption/consumer behavior
social welfare policy and systems
household
survey data
cross-section
The basic population is the housing stock of Hungary; out of this a national representative regionally proportionate sample was drawn. Response rate 75%.
face-to-face interview
A
